title: Can't install league
body: Well, this is my issue, this morning I had some issues opening league so I uninstalled and installed ir again. Once it is installed you must open the old launcher in order to install the new one and be able to play, but whenever I try to open the old launcher just the league logo pops up and then disappears without opening anything more.  I looked up in the task manager and league is executing and downloading so i left it there. But when i came back to my computer a message which bugsplat dll is not found was there, what should i do in order to  get the game installed and play?

replies.body: It sounds like something is blocking your game files from being accessed, so the patcher isn't able to launch or locate assets.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help make sure that your settings or antivirus will allow access.  Let me know if that helps you out!

Thanks for replying so fast, i tried to do that and nothing worked, although i noticed that even if the cliend doesnt show up it is trying to patch i may try to reset computer taking into account that i only have chrome installed and don't have any important data there thanks for answering I will let you know wether that works or not
Did you find a way to solve it?
